subject: Doping (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: A day after player representatives approved an overhaul of the N.F.L. protocols on drugs and performance-enhancing substances, the players union said it hoped to have a final agreement “very soon.”
snippet: A day after player representatives approved an overhaul of the N.F.L. protocols on drugs and performance-enhancing substances, the players union said it hoped to have a final agreement “very soon.”
